In case anyone would be wondering: yes, this really is a 720p resolution rip of only 700MiB. It is certainly watchable thanks to the amazing scalability of H.264, but quality is not stellar. Something like A/V 7/6. Don't expect to see any detail in dark or smoky scenes.

And yes Tinny_pb, the credits have been clipped.
